attributes.action: call for those MPs stepping down due to expenses scandals to do so immediately
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs who have been found to have broken the rules regarding expenses should not be paid until the next general election. They should have the integrity to stand down now; and if they don't then the various parties involved should disown them and make it clear that this is unacceptable. In addition a mechanism whereby the public can trigger a by-election should be put in place - not later but immediately. This would allow MPs who have broken the rules to be forced out making MPs more accountable to their constituents.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
